basic_info.name: IITTM Gwalior Facilities
description: The administrative block, the focal point of all activities is complemented by well equipped classrooms, library and computer lab.
Library

As an indispensable organ in the academic enterprise, the Library provides the IITTM community with the information resources and services fundamental to learning and the pursuit of knowledge .It is one of the resourceful library ,one of its kind in travel and tourism education in India . The collection consists of books on tourism, management, information technology and varied subjects, reports, conference souvenirs, previous volumes of periodicals, CD-ROMs. The Library also includes a reference collection consists of Encyclopedias, Dictionaries and collection of classics of World literature.
Computer Lab

The Computer Center equips students with necessary skills to be employed in an information- intensive work environment. The faculty members ,students and staff are provided with a networked node to access digital technologies .The Computer Centre is equipped with generic software packages like SPSS, Flash,Ms-Office,Tally and also industry specific softwares among which Amadeus ,Sabre and Galileo are widely used by students . In addition ,internet facility is provided to the faculty and students for academic purposes .
Auditorium

The institute has got a newly built, fully equipped indoor auditorium with a capacity of 350. All major lectures by eminent experts and academicians and cultural functions are organized in the auditorium.
Hostel Complex

A fully furnished residential complex ensconced in the institute campus with all modern facilities supplements the academic infrastructure. Two separate hostels for boys and girls have a cumulative capacity of 120 beds. The institute also maintains a small guest house in the campus, including fully furnished AC rooms.
Sports & Yoga Facilities

The institute has fully equipped indoor sports facilities for table tennis, billiards etc. It also has provision for outdoor games such as cricket, volleyball etc. Lecture Halls IITTM has fully equipped lecture halls for its courses. The faculties, both in-house and visiting can avail the OHP & LCD facilities for their teaching purposes. The students use these facilities as well for the purpose of their report presentations, powerpoint presentations and case study analysis.

basic_info.name: About IITTM Gwalior
description: Indian Institute of Tourism and Travel Management (IITTM) is an autonomous body under Ministry of Tourism, Government of India and is one of the premier institutes in the country offering education, training, research and consultancy in sustainable management of tourism, travel and other allied sectors. The stakeholdersâ€™ realization that the country is in need of such professionals who can provide an excellent standard of products and services, resulted in the creation of IITTM in 1983 at New Delhi.

It is devoted to the pursuit of higher knowledge in tourism and its dissemination to a diverse audience. Over the years, Institute has established a distinguished identity of its own and reached at a commanding position among sectoral B-Schools in the country. With its focus in meeting the changing needs of the tourism industry, it has played a pioneering role in the propagation and professionalisation of tourism education. The management of the Institute is entrusted in the hands of the Board of Governors having the Union Minister for Tourism as its Chairperson.

Section.name: About IITTM Gwalior
Section.description:
Indian Institute of Tourism and Travel Management (IITTM), established in 1983, is an autonomous body under the Ministry of Tourism, Government of India. It is one of the premier institutes in the country. IITTM campuses are located at Gwalior, Bhubaneswar, Noida, Goa, and Nellore offering education, training, research and consultancy in sustainable management of tourism, travel and other allied sectors.
IITTM has 2 camp offices, located at Shillong and Bodh Gaya. Over the years, the Institute has established a distinguished identity of its own and reached a commanding position among sectoral B-Schools in the country. The Ministry of Tourism, Government of India has also entrusted the institute to conduct regional level guide training programs for all the regions of the country.
IITTM offers admission to its 2 years full-time regular Masters of Business Administration (MBA) and 3 years full-time regular Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA) in Tourism and Travel being run under the collaborative scheme of Indira Gandhi National Tribal University, Amarkantak (A Central University established by an Act of Parliament) through online Admission Test IIAT-2024.
